item.title: Fallafel
item.description: Ingredients Chickpeas: I use canned chickpeas to save a step, rinsed and drained. Fresh herbs: I love brightening up my falafel with lots and lots of fresh cilantro and parsley! The fresh taste is unbeatable, and all of those herbs also the falafel a lovely green hue. Garlic: Feel free to add a little extra garlic to the recipe below if youâ€™re a mega garlic lover. Onion: White, red or yellow will work.
